author: FOSTER KLUG
title: World leaders fine-tune sanctions meant to punish Russia
description: TOKYO (AP) — Twenty million dollars in U.N. humanitarian funds for Ukraine. A raft of new, stronger sanctions against Russia from Japan, Australia, Taiwan and others. And a cascade of condemnation from the highest levels.
